name: Karen - The Chicken
description:
Karen The Chicken its a game about the escape plans of this clever chicken in the hope to pursue freedom in any achievable way possible.

This game has interactive and mini puzzles for those unwillingly to try break the shackles of oppression. Casual and fun its all that you will get with this non sense game. Enjoy it. 

This game use:

W, A, S, D to walk;

Space to jump;

Shift to sprint;

and E to interact.

Unity Store Assets used in this game

All the Assests used in this game are open licensed term.
